mebel.name: Ergonomic Chair
mebel.description: This chair is designed to provide maximum comfort and support while you work.

mebel.name: L-shaped Sofa
mebel.description: This sofa provides ample seating for you and your guests, and the L-shape is perfect for maximizing space.

mebel.name: Glass-top Dining Table
mebel.description: This table features a sleek glass top that is easy to clean and complements any dining room decor.

mebel.name: Queen-size Bed
mebel.description: This bed is the perfect size for a couple or anyone who wants a little extra room to stretch out.

mebel.name: Wooden Wardrobe
mebel.description: This wardrobe is made of high-quality wood and features plenty of storage space for all your clothes and accessories.

mebel.name: Metal Almirah
mebel.description: This almirah is made of durable metal and features several shelves and drawers for organizing your belongings.

mebel.name: Round Dimple Chair
mebel.description: This chair features a unique dimple design that provides extra comfort and support for your back.

mebel.name: Wooden Book Rack
mebel.description: This book rack is made of sturdy wood and provides ample storage space for your favorite books and magazines.

mebel.name: TV Stand with Storage
mebel.description: This TV stand features several shelves and drawers for storing your media devices, cables, and accessories.

mebel.name: Leather Recliner
mebel.description: This recliner is made of high-quality leather and features a built-in footrest for maximum relaxation.

mebel.name: Sectional Sofa
mebel.description: This sectional sofa provides plenty of seating for your family and friends, and the chaise lounge is perfect for lounging and watching TV.

mebel.name: Glass Coffee Table
mebel.description: This coffee table features a beautiful glass top and a sturdy metal frame for a modern look.

mebel.name: King-size Bed
mebel.description: This bed is perfect for anyone who wants plenty of space to stretch out and get a good night's sleep.

mebel.name: White Dresser
mebel.description: This dresser is made of solid wood and features several drawers for storing your clothes and accessories.

mebel.name: Metal Shoe Rack
mebel.description: This shoe rack is made of sturdy metal and features several shelves for organizing your shoes.

mebel.name: Corner Bookshelf
mebel.description: This corner bookshelf is perfect for maximizing space in your home and features several shelves for your favorite books and decor.

mebel.name: Wooden Computer Desk
mebel.description: This desk is made of high-quality wood and features several drawers and shelves for organizing your computer and accessories.

mebel.name: Leather Loveseat
mebel.description: This loveseat is made of high-quality leather and is perfect for small spaces or as an accent piece in your living room.

mebel.name: Single Bed with Storage
mebel.description: This single bed features several drawers and shelves for storing your clothes and accessories, making it perfect for small bedrooms.

mebel.name: Metal Wardrobe
mebel.description: This wardrobe is made of durable metal and features several shelves and drawers for organizing your clothes and accessories.
